To those who cant save the game.. Run the .exe as Admin.

Running the .exe as admin. The game save my last checkpoint but does not save any ego boosts or my difficulty level. Win 7 x64. Anyone else noticing this issue. I seem to have it narrowed down the progress.ini not being written properly.

Running the game on windows 7x64 as admin. It saves my settings, and also my most recent checkpoint. It does not properly save, which levels are completed if i go to chapter select, which ego boosts are gotten, and also what difficulty level I am on. Anyone else noticing these sames issues? The problem seems to be in the progress.ini file.
Still can't select the chapters via chapter select. Mehh.
